Adding an item: 
	 To add an item, go to the "Full Inventory"
 page by clicking on the button in the main page.
 Next, click on either "+" button on the bottom right side of the page to add an item.
 Alternatively, click on the three dots on the top right side of the menu bar, then click the 'add item' button.

How to use Low Stock items: 
	 When inputting information for the item you will be asked for a 'low item threshold', this determines when an item will be marked as a low stock item.
 If the inputted, or updated, quantity of the item is every below or equal to the threshold, the item will be automatically marked as "low stock".
 Once the item quantity is above the threshold, the item will be automatically unmarked as "low stock".
 "Low stock" items can be viewed by clicking the "low stock" button in the main menu.

Priority Items: \n \t When adding an item to your inventory, at the bottom of the page there is a checkbox for making an item as a priority item.\n If this box is checked then the item will be marked as priority and can be viewed separately in the "priority items" page of the app.
